name: Meelo Madness!
description:
The floor and walls are lava! Reach the green pad to move on to the next level!

Controls:
A    -    Rotate Left
D    -    Rotate Right
Spacebar    -    Fart!

Made with general guidance from "Complete C# Unity Developer 3D: Learn to Code Making Games" by Ben Tristem and Rick Davidson on Udemy (https://www.udemy.com/course/unitycourse2/)

Character credits go to Avatar: The Legend of Korra
